cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 355 mi SSW of New Orleans, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating north then north-northeast toward southeastern Louisiana with inland track across Mississippi/Alabama and the southeastern U.S.

weather_observation.watch_coast: West of Morgan City LA to Intracoastal City LA (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Walton/Bay Co. line FL; Storm Surge Warning Mouth of Atchafalaya River LA to Navarre FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeast Louisiana eastward through the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Peripheral gusty winds 20–30 mph, isolated gusts to 35 mph possible Wednesday afternoon-evening
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches of intermittent rain possible, mainly Wednesday afternoon into early Thursday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated brief tornado threat remains east of the port, none anticipated for Beaumont
